revised_title: Observations on Osteocolla and the Properties of Antimony
tldr: The author, Johannes Christophorus Beckman, shares his observations about Osteocolla, a mineral found in sandy soil, and its properties. He describes its appearance, growth, and how it hardens when exposed to the sun. He also discusses the use of Antimony in treating diseases in animals, such as pigs, horses, and its effectiveness in healing running legs.
